intension: Create a Spring season sale advertisement for a fashion retailer offering a 50% discount. The theme is floral with blue and white colors. The call to action is SHOP NOW.
globalcaption: The image features a beautiful bouquet of white flowers, possibly daffodils, arranged in a vase. The flowers are spread out, with some positioned closer to the front and others further back. The bouquet is placed on a table, creating an elegant and visually appealing display.
keywords: discount, offer, promotion, retail, season, seasonal, spring, tb, flowers, style, fashion, collection, instagram, insta, ig, ad, advertisement, floral, blue, white

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white square with a blue background. The square is adorned with a decorative border, which includes a pattern of leaves and flowers. The leaves and flowers are scattered around the square, adding a touch of elegance and visual interest to the design. The combination of the white square and the blue background creates a striking contrast, making the overall appearance of the image quite appealing

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a white wall with a variety of white flowers arranged in a bouquet. The flowers are of different sizes and are spread across the wall, creating a visually appealing display. Some of the flowers are larger and more prominent, while others are smaller and more delicate. The bouquet is a beautiful arrangement of white flowers, showcasing their beauty and elegance
